attributes.action: Organise a big screen to watch the Rugby World Cup Final in central London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely a great city like London can organise a large screen in central London to watch a world cup final?!? Come on Gordon! we'll even listen to bag pipes at half time if it makes you feel any better..

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
